adrFormatAddress: 2062 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10029-4704, USA

originalText.text: Worst Pharmacy you could choose, They’ll never fill your prescription on time. They wait till the last minutes to even look at new orders, Do not send your medicine here!!!

text.text: Worst Pharmacy you could choose, They’ll never fill your prescription on time. They wait till the last minutes to even look at new orders, Do not send your medicine here!!!

originalText.text: Excellent Customer service. They always are in touch with the clients and health providers to help to get prescriptions on time.  10/10.

text.text: Excellent Customer service. They always are in touch with the clients and health providers to help to get prescriptions on time.  10/10.

originalText.text: This is the WORST PHARMACY IN ALL OF SPANISH HARLEM!!!! The entire personnel from the receptionist all the way to the Pharmacist are extremely unprofessional!!! My husband was receiving all of his prescriptions from this pharmacy and for personal reasons we transferred to a different pharmacy, we left 1 prescription with Drug Stop Pharmacy because it was a controlled substance and hard to transfer out. We called to get the prescription filled and was told because of their “EXISTING POLICY SINCE LAST YEAR” they will not fill the prescription. But, just last month they did fill the prescription and it was the only prescription that my husband had at the time. They are saying if you transfer out some prescriptions you have to transfer out ALL PRESCRIPTIONS  and that their policy will not let them fill a controlled prescription if that is the only one you want filled. That is a BIG FAT LIE!!!! They are being spiteful, childish and unprofessional!! Thank GOD we did transfer pharmacies because I don’t want to have to deal with childish adults who are upset that we are no longer using their pharmacy!!! Don’t go to Drug Stop if you don’t want a big headache!!!!!!

originalText.text: The staff and Pharmacist are wonderful! They are caring and compassionate always.

originalText.text: Great customer service. I moved from 103rd to 121st & 3rd Ave and I still go to Drug stop pharmacy. Sam and all the workers there always go up and beyond. To assure me and my son have our asthma medication.
